data.message: Anyone who thinks this album is trash has no idea about what Eminem is doing... He's not trying to make catchy songs.. His emphasis is on lyricism and straight raping... That's what all of the current shady artists are about....not to mention I bet the majority of his references and word play go right over your heads... Go bump his first 3 major releases and stop fucking crying... He is the G.O.A.T. no question and this album is fire..

replies.message: Thanks I been trying tell ppl this forever :)
Finally a logical comment that knows whats up.
Check out my music page if you guys get a chance! www.soundcloud.com/desotbx
His lyrics are great for sure and I appreciate lyrical content more then most, but for me this album will get no play. I have been through it 4 or 5 times and nothing is standing out.

Please Eminem Can Be Arguably A G.O.A.T bcoz of 2 reasons  1. There Is No Real Goat 2. His Albums Have Only 5-6 Good Songs . If You Want To Listen To Dope Albums Listen To Illmatic By Nas Or Paid In Full By Rakim & Eric B  Nothing by Eminem Is On That  Levels That Eliminates Him From Being G.O.A.T In My Opinion Trust Me I Am A Eminem Fan But This Is My Opinion
